plot: An examination of masculinity and manhood in contemporary Casablanca, On Divan follows the lives of three brothers, Khalid, Rabi'e and Ayoub as they navigate expectations of family and society.
title: On Divan
plot_es: An examination of masculinity and manhood in contemporary Casablanca, On Divan follows the lives of three brothers, Khalid, Rabi'e and Ayoub as they navigate expectations of family and society.
plot_en: An examination of masculinity and manhood in contemporary Casablanca, On Divan follows the lives of three brothers, Khalid, Rabi'e and Ayoub as they navigate expectations of family and society.
